name: CrossTown 1: Giften
storyline: Giften ("The Poison") is the tale of journalist Minna Walker and her quest to uncover if someone poisoned the water supply of the city of CrossTown.
summary: CrossTown: Giften is the first game in the CrossTown series of mystery adventure games. Minna Walker explores the city of CrossTown, looking for clues and interrogating citizens in order to save the city itself from an impending catastrophe. The game features dialogue puzzles and tools to record and replay dialogue for clues.
